text: Bros is a 2022 American romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Nicholas Stoller from a screenplay he co-wrote with Billy Eichner. Eichner also stars and executive producer of this movie. The movie stars with Luke Macfarlane, Ts Madison, Monica Raymund, Guillermo DÃ­az, Guy Branum, and Amanda Bearse. It is a gay romantic comedy made by a major studio, and it has an openly LGBTQ+ principal cast. Bros had its world premiere at the 2022 Toronto International Film Festival on September 9, 2022. Later it was released in threaters in the United States on September 30, 2022, by Universal Pictures. The movie got positive reviews from critics but disappointed at the box office. The movie has grossed $9.2 million against a budget of $22 million. == Cast == == Marketing == In the first trailer of the movie, it was styled as "NSFW Trailer". It was released on May 18, 2022. Later, the official trailer was released on June 16, 2022. == Release == The movie had its world premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival on September 9, 2022. Later it was released in threaters in the United States on September 30, 2022, by Universal Pictures. It was originally scheduled for release on August 12, 2022. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Movies set in museums Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:2022 romantic comedy movies Category:2020s LGBT movies
title: Bros (movie)
